snippet.title: Xenoblade Chronicles: US Trailer
snippet.description:
The epic Japanese game Xenoblade Chronicles has finally been announced for a U.S. release on the Nintendo Wii. It's time to get excited  this announcement trailer should help.
Get more Xenoblade at IGN:
http://wii.ign.com/objects/143/14354769.html
